ðŸ“– Summary: The UnpromptedControl repository provides a way to restore images and remove objects from images without user prompts. It leverages ControlNet and Stable Diffusion models for image inpainting and restoration, using techniques like controlnet-canny and OpenCV inpainting. The primary use case is to streamline image editing workflows by automating object removal and image restoration processes.
